sprache.aeskey2: The AES key is needed to crypt sensible data like FTP Passwords. Make sure it is a very secure string.
sprache.aeskey3: Safe this key. If this is lost, all encrypted data cannot be recovered.
sprache.brandname2: Voice- and gameserver names can be searched for this servertag
sprache.captcha_2: Use a Captcha at the login
sprache.cron_external_text: In case you cannot make use of internal cronjobs, the same files can be called with an external cronjob. If you want to make use of this you need to whitelist the calling IP(s) at the Easy-Wi settings:
sprache.cron_internal_text: The recommended method is to use internal cronjobs. Those could be installed like:
sprache.data: Please fill out following data fields. All are required
sprache.email2: This email will be used when sending data to the users.
sprache.error_config_php_data: Error: File stuff/config.php exists but does not contain all variables!
sprache.error_config_keyphrase_php_missing: Error: File stuff/config.php and or stuff/keyphrasefile.php does not exist!
sprache.error_database: Error: Can not establish a connection to the database
sprache.error_game_insert: Error: Game could not be added:
sprache.error_keyphrase_php_create: Error: File stuff/config.php and or stuff/keyphrasefile.php cannot be created!
sprache.error_password: Error: The passwords do not match!
sprache.error_system_curl: curl extension is not installed, please install it.
sprache.error_system_ftp: ftp extension is not installed, please install it.
sprache.error_system_fopen: fopen function cannot be used. please enable it.
sprache.error_system_gd: gd extension is not installed, please install it.
sprache.error_system_hash: hash extension is not installed, please install it.
sprache.error_system_php_version: At least PHP 7.4 (outdated) is required. Your PHP version is to old and not Supported anymore:

sprache.error_system_openssl: openssl extension is not installed, please install it.
sprache.error_system_PDO: PDO extension is not installed, please install it.
sprache.error_system_pdo_mysql: pdo_mysql extension is not installed, please install it.
sprache.error_system_php_version: At least PHP 7.4 (outdated) is required. Your PHP version is to old and not Supported anymore:
sprache.error_system_SimpleXML: SimpleXML extension is not installed, please install it.
sprache.error_system_zip: zip extension is not installed, please install it.
sprache.faillogins2: Possible failed Logins in a row
sprache.finished: The installation has been completed. Please remove the "install" directory.
sprache.games_insert: The next step will add gameserver templates and addons.
sprache.image_server2: If a masterinstallation is not set up the data will be downloaded from this server.
sprache.install_done: The installation is now completed. Please keep in mind to configure the cronjobs.
sprache.ok_admin_user: The initial admin account has been successfully created.
sprache.ok_files_created: Files stuff/keyphrasefile.php and config.php could be created.
sprache.ok_gameserver_data: The gameserver data has been added.
sprache.passwords_not_meet_req: Password does not meet the requirements
sprache.prefix2: If you define a username the users unique ids will be appended to the defined name. Only small letters and numbers are allowed. Example: customer will be customer2 and counting

sprache.system_check_error_folder_not_writable_2: exists, but nothing can be changed
sprache.system_ok_php_version: At least PHP 7.4 (outdated) is required. Your PHP version is current enough:
sprache.title: Homepage title
sprache.welcome_old_version: Warning you are going to install an outdated version. The current is:
sprache.welcome_text: At first we will run a system check that will ensure your webspace offers the required functionality. Afterwards database tables will be created and the initial data inserted and configured.
